html: Just an observation: For $10 per month, YouTube Red removes all of YouTube's pre-role ads (and throws in access to a few million Google Music tunes). On most news-media sites I subscribe to, I still get intrusive ads. And then they throw in NPR-like requests for "support."
text:
Just an observation:

For $10 per month, YouTube Red removes all of YouTube's pre-role ads (and throws in access to a few million Google Music tunes). 

On most news-media sites I subscribe to, I still get intrusive ads. And then they throw in NPR-like requests for "support."

html: An Act of Congress signed into law in 1968 created the national holiday, "Washington's Birthday." The name "Presidents Day" was rejected. Why does it matter? (1) Washington deserved a holiday. (2) Several Presidents don't. More from the National Archives: https://www.archives.gov/publications/prologue/2004/winter/gw-birthday-1.html …pic.twitter.com/QU0SERQywu
text:
An Act of Congress signed into law in 1968 created the national holiday, "Washington's Birthday." The name "Presidents Day" was rejected. Why does it matter? (1) Washington deserved a holiday. (2) Several Presidents don't.
